皇上.definition: the emperor; Your majesty the emperor; His imperial majesty

皇上不急太監急.pinyin: huáng shàng bù jí tài jiān jí
皇上不急太監急.definition: see 皇帝不急太監急|皇帝不急太监急[huang2 di4 bu4 ji2 tai4 jian4 ji2]

皇上不急急太監.pinyin: huáng shàng bù jí jí tài jiān
皇上不急急太監.definition: see 皇帝不急太監急|皇帝不急太监急[huang2 di4 bu4 ji2 tai4 jian4 ji2]

皇冠上的明珠.pinyin: huáng guān shàng de míng zhū
皇冠上的明珠.definition: the brightest jewel in the crown

皇冠假日酒店.pinyin: huáng guān jià rì jiǔ diàn

皇冠出版集團.pinyin: huáng guān chū bǎn jí tuán

皇后區.definition: Queens, one of the five boroughs of New York City

皇城.definition: Imperial City, inner part of Beijing, with the Forbidden City at its center

皇天不負苦心人.pinyin: huáng tiān bù fù kǔ xīn rén
皇天不負苦心人.definition: Heaven will not disappoint the person who tries (idiom). If you try hard, you're bound to succeed eventually.

皇太極.definition: Hong Taiji (1592-1643), eighth son of Nurhaci 努爾哈赤|努尔哈赤[Nu3 er3 ha1 chi4], reigned 1626-1636 as Second Khan of Later Jin dynasty 後金|后金[Hou4 Jin1], then founded the Qing dynasty 大清[Da4 Qing1] and reigned 1636-1643 as Emperor; posthumous name 清太宗[Qing1 Tai4 zong1]

皇太極清太宗.pinyin: huáng tài jí qīng tài zōng
皇太極清太宗.definition: Hong Taiji (1592-1643), eighth son of Nurhaci 努爾哈赤|努尔哈赤[Nu3 er3 ha1 chi4], reigned 1626-1636 as Second Khan of Later Jin dynasty 後金|后金[Hou4 Jin1], then founded the Qing dynasty 大清[Da4 Qing1] and reigned 1636-1643 as Emperor

皇姑.definition: Huanggu district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning

皇姑區.definition: Huanggu district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning

皇室.definition: royal family; imperial household; member of the royal family

皇家加勒比海遊輪公司.pinyin: huáng jiā jiā lè bǐ hǎi yóu lún gōng sī

皇家香港警察.pinyin: huáng jiā xiāng gǎng jǐng chá

皇家騎警.definition: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), Canadian federal and national police force; Mounties

皇帝不急太監急.pinyin: huáng dì bù jí tài jiān jí
皇帝不急太監急.definition: lit. the emperor is not worried, but his eunuchs are (idiom); fig. the observers are more anxious than the person involved

皇帝不急急死太監.pinyin: huáng dì bù jí jí sǐ tài jiān
皇帝不急急死太監.definition: see 皇帝不急太監急|皇帝不急太监急[huang2 di4 bu4 ji2 tai4 jian4 ji2]

皇帝女兒不愁嫁.pinyin: huáng dì nǚ ér bù chóu jià
皇帝女兒不愁嫁.definition: lit. the emperor's daughter does not worry about whether she will be able to marry (idiom); fig. highly sought after

皇恩.definition: imperial kindness; benevolence from the emperor

皇族內閣.definition: Qing emergency cabinet set up in May 1911 to confront the Xinhai rebels

皇曆.definition: variant of 黃曆|黄历[huang2 li5]

皇朝.definition: the imperial court; the government in imperial times

皇榜.definition: imperial notice (announcement in the form of a notice posted with the authority of the emperor)

皇法.definition: imperial law; same as 王法[wang2 fa3]

皇甫嵩.definition: Huangfu Song (-195), later Han general and warlord

皇甫鎛.definition: Huangfu Bo (c. 800), Minister during early Tang

皇皇.definition: magnificent; variant of 惶惶[huang2 huang2]; variant of 遑遑[huang2 huang2]

皇糧.definition: lit. imperial funding for troops; funds or items supplied by the government

皇親國戚.definition: the emperor relatives (idiom); person with powerful connections

皇馬.definition: Real Madrid soccer team; abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
